name: Partners In Uncertainty
description:
NOTE: This game requires 2 people playing on different devices

Partners in Uncertainty is a 2-player cooperative puzzle platformer where players must help each other get to the end of their level. However, each level has a different mechanic that they must figure out.

Starting a Game

To start a game, one player creates a room by typing the name of their room (it can be named anything) into the Host textbox and then clicking "Host". This should take you to the player select screen. If it does not, then that room name is currently in use and you will have to select another. To join a room, type the name of the room into the Join textbox and click "join"

Controls

WASD: movement
Mouse: Camera
Space: Jump
Left Control: Crouch
